settings.title: Green Valley encourages and promotes art culture in a vibrant and inclusive manner. Our students are creative and talented in music, theater, dance and visual arts .
Instructors at Green Valley expose students to diverse dance and choreography as they explore dance as a language.

settings.title: The ensemble programs in Green Valley, both instrumental and choral offer numerous performance opportunities to all students despite their level of expertise.
The academy offers advanced studio course for uppers and seniors, which includes visits to museums and a student-designed capstone project and exhibition.

settings.title: Green Valley's theater comprises of several teacher directed plays and many student directed one-act plays. Courses include acting, directing, public speaking, Shakespeare and play production.
Here, you learn how to grow.

Enroll for a new admission on or before December 2018.
